Text: Journal of Statistical SoftwarePST JSS which is at publishes statistical software with manuals as well as papers describing comparing and evaluating statistical software Abstracts of all contributions accepted in JSS are published in printed form in JCGS Although we publish software written in any language we especially welcome software written in R The general idea is that packages written in R can be documented in both R News and in JSS but that generally the description in JSS will be more extensive and more seriously peerreviewed Everybody in the R community is encouraged to submit their R products to JSS we even welcome code snippet type of contributions which will go into a separate section of the journal Volume consists so far of the following three issues issue S Weisberg Dimension reduction regression in R issue A Zeileis F Leisch and K Hornik strucchange an R package for testing for structural change in linear regression models issue G Marsaglia and WW Tsang Some difficulttopass tests of randomness Jan de Leeuw Professor and Chair UCLA Department of Statistics US mail Boelter Hall Box Los Angeles CA phone fax email homepage deleeuw No matter where you go there you are Buckaroo Banzai deleeuwsoundsnomatterau rannounce mailing list Read hornikRRFAQhtml Send info help or unsubscribe in the body not the subject To
